vv84:3.4: Vaṅkaṁ bhayā → vaṅkaṁ bhayaṁ (bj); vaṅkambhayā (sya1ed, sya2ed); dhaṅkaṁbhayā (mr)
vv84:5.2: kena → kena nu (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
vv84:14.3: cime → dumā ca te (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
vv84:17.3: vaggu ca susaṅgato ca → vaggu sumukho susaṅgato (bj); vaggū ca susaṅgato ca (sya1ed, sya2ed)
vv84:32.1: ca sirīsavanā → ime sirīsūpavanā ca (bj); ime sirisapavanā (sya1ed, sya2ed); ime pi sirīsapavarā ca (pts-vp-pli1); ime pi sirīsavanā ca (pts-vp-pli2, mr)
vv84:32.2: Dibbā → dibbā ca (pts-vp-pli1, mr) | surabhī → surabhiṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli2, mr) | sampavanti → pavanti (sya1ed, sya2ed); sampavāyanti (mr)
vv84:44.3: teniha → tenīha (bj); te na hi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | bhasmī → bhasmi (sya1ed, sya2ed); bhasma (mr)
vv84:49.2: purakkhatvā → purakkhipitvā (bj, pts-vp-pli2); purakkhitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
vv84:53.3: Ānandī vittā → ānandacittā (sya1ed, sya2ed); anandacittā (pts-vp-pli1); ānandīcittā (mr)
